code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import JsBarcode from'jsbarcode';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const BarcodeCanvas=_ref=>{let{value}=_ref;const canvasRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(canvasRef.current){try{JsBarcode(canvasRef.current,value,{format:'CODE128',lineColor:'#ffffff',background:'#2d3748',width:2,height:50,displayValue:true,fontOptions:"bold",font:"Inter",fontSize:16,textColor:"#ffffff",margin:10});}catch(e){console.error("Barcode generation failed:",e);}}},[value]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:canvasRef});};export const PrintableBarcodeCanvas=_ref2=>{let{value}=_ref2;const canvasRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(canvasRef.current){try{JsBarcode(canvasRef.current,value,{format:'CODE128',lineColor:'#000000',background:'#ffffff',width:1.5,height:40,displayValue:false,margin:10});}catch(e){console.error("Printable Barcode generation failed:",e);}}},[value]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:canvasRef});};
